detail_desc: Relaxed-fit polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Cotton cap with a print motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Biker jacket in imitation leather. Notch lapels with decorative press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ankle-length legs with creases.
Shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.

Wrap dress woven in a silk blend with a sheen. Pointed lapels, a button at the top, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and visible buttons down the sides. Long sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Long-sleeved dress in chiffon crêpe with a V-neck, buttons at the front and a gently tapered waist with a gathered seam. Unlined.
Cap in a cotton weave with a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.

Shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a chest pocket. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and decorative buttons at the front.
Calf-length trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with wide, straight legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Sports top in marled, fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and visible seams.
Block-coloured jersey T-shirt in a soft cotton blend.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Playsuit in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and tapered waist. Covered buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and wide, short legs. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.

Puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and taped zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, an inner pocket, ribbed cuffs and concealed, covered elastication at the hem. Polyester filling.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre and lace with a lined gusset, laser-cut edges at the front and a high cut at the back.
Nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with soft lace trims. Non-wired padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck and button placket. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Heavily draping jersey top with a sheen and short sleeves.
Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted button at the top and scalloped edges.
Push-up bras in microfibre with mesh details. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cap in a marled weave with an appliqué at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Patterned swimsuit with a small stand-up collar, frill trim over the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and short legs. Zip with a zip guard at the back. UPF 50.
Short skater skirt in soft fabric. Unlined.
Joggers in velour with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed jersey hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Nightdress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short, elasticated raglan sleeves and an elasticated neckline.

Running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a zipped key pocket on one hip, reflective details, ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees and a zip at the hems.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes and a small satin bow at the front.
Boxy-style blouse in soft satin with a sheen. Notch lapels and buttons down the front.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
Soft ballet pumps in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Blunt toes and elastication at the heels. Imitation leather insoles.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
T-shirt in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with pin-tucks that create a striped pattern.

Oversized jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides. Unlined. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Heart-shaped bag in faux fur with a zip at the top and a grosgrain shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined.
Lace bras with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in an airy weave with a gathered neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pin-tucks and a pleated skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length, straight-cut dress in a softly draping weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-neck with a concealed button at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with a shiny metal button at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Body in jersey with narrow shoulder straps. Lined over the bust and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with sections in a double layer of woven fabric on the hood and sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with a drawstring, and a taped zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with a mesh section and elastication at the cuffs. Large side pockets with a concealed zip in the side seams. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
Paper straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and long raglan sleeves with lace. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted vest top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Chino shorts in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Cropped top in soft jersey with short sleeves. Open back with crossover lacing and lace trims at the back.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.

Short dress in crinkled chiffon with a straight-cut yoke at the top with a small frill trim and gathers. Long, wide sleeves with a seam and flared flounces, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Nylon baseball jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. One inner pocket. Lined.
Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather with covered heels, narrow foot straps and a narrow, double ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 7 cm.
Short skirt in a softly draping viscose weave. High, elasticated drawstring waist with a frill trim, and a flounce at the hem.
Flared leggings in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication.
Trousers in softly draping, slightly stretchy cotton twill. Regular waist with adjustable elastication, a zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim legs.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined, faux fur-trimmed hood. Taped zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets with a taped zip, and elastication at the back of the waist, cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the back and legs, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Folded seams and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with pleats at the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with print motifs on the front and sleeves. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and high cut at the back.
Rings made from recycled zinc in different designs, one with inset rhinestones.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a bow at the front.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
